alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 1:19PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Meriwether and southeastern Troup Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 119 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over LaGrange, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Greenville, Saint Marks, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, Odessadale, Stovall, Hillcrest, Big Springs, Durand, Wares Crossroads, Harris City, and Smiths Crossroad. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
